verses.verse: And Moses<WH4872> called<WH7121> all Israel<WH3478>, and said<WH559> unto them, Hear<WH8085>, O Israel<WH3478>, the statutes<WH2706> and judgments<WH4941> which I speak<WH1696> in your ears<WH241> this day<WH3117>, that ye may learn<WH3925> them, and keep<WH8104>, and do<WH6213> them.
The LORD<WH3068> our God<WH430> made<WH3772> a covenant<WH1285> with us in Horeb<WH2722>.
The LORD<WH3068> made<WH3772> not this covenant<WH1285> with our fathers<WH1>, but with us<WH587>, even us, who are all of us<WH428> here alive<WH2416> this day<WH3117>.
The LORD<WH3068> talked<WH1696> with you face<WH6440> to face<WH6440> in the mount<WH2022> out of the midst<WH8432> of the fire<WH784>,

(I stood<WH5975> between the LORD<WH3068> and you at that time<WH6256>, to shew<WH5046> you the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068>: for ye were afraid<WH3372> by reason<WH6440> of the fire<WH784>, and went not up<WH5927> into the mount<WH2022>;) saying<WH559>,
¶ I am the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430>, which brought thee out<WH3318> of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>, from the house<WH1004> of bondage<WH5650>.
Thou shalt have none other<WH312> gods<WH430> before<WH6440> me.

Thou shalt not make<WH6213> thee any graven image<WH6459>, or any likeness<WH8544> of any thing that is in heaven<WH8064> above<WH4605>, or that is in the earth<WH776> beneath, or that is in the waters<WH4325> beneath the earth<WH776>:

Thou shalt not bow down<WH7812> thyself unto them, nor serve<WH5647> them: for I the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> am a jealous<WH7067> God<WH410>, visiting<WH6485> the iniquity<WH5771> of the fathers<WH1> upon the children<WH1121> unto the third<WH8029> and fourth<WH7256> generation of them that hate<WH8130> me,
And shewing<WH6213> mercy<WH2617> unto thousands<WH505> of them that love<WH157> me and keep<WH8104> my commandments<WH4687>.

Thou shalt not take<WH5375> the name<WH8034> of the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> in vain<WH7723>: for the LORD<WH3068> will not hold him guiltless<WH5352> that taketh<WH5375> his name<WH8034> in vain<WH7723>.
Keep<WH8104> the sabbath<WH7676> day<WH3117> to sanctify<WH6942> it, as the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> hath commanded<WH6680> thee.
Six<WH8337> days<WH3117> thou shalt labour<WH5647>, and do<WH6213> all thy work<WH4399>:

But the seventh<WH7637> day<WH3117> is the sabbath<WH7676> of the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430>: in it thou shalt not do<WH6213> any work<WH4399>, thou, nor thy son<WH1121>, nor thy daughter<WH1323>, nor thy manservant<WH5650>, nor thy maidservant<WH519>, nor thine ox<WH7794>, nor thine ass<WH2543>, nor any of thy cattle<WH929>, nor thy stranger<WH1616> that is within thy gates<WH8179>; that thy manservant<WH5650> and thy maidservant<WH519> may rest<WH5117> as well as thou.

And remember<WH2142> that thou wast a servant<WH5650> in the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>, and that the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> brought<WH3318> thee out thence through a mighty<WH2389> hand<WH3027> and by a stretched out<WH5186> arm<WH2220>: therefore the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> commanded<WH6680> thee to keep<WH6213> the sabbath<WH7676> day<WH3117>.

¶ Honour<WH3513> thy father<WH1> and thy mother<WH517>, as the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> hath commanded<WH6680> thee; that thy days<WH3117> may be prolonged<WH748>, and that it may go well<WH3190> with thee, in the land<WH127> which the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> giveth<WH5414> thee.
Thou shalt not kill<WH7523>.
Neither shalt thou commit adultery<WH5003>.
Neither shalt thou steal<WH1589>.
Neither shalt thou bear<WH6030> false<WH7723> witness<WH5707> against thy neighbour<WH7453>.

Neither shalt thou desire<WH2530> thy neighbour's<WH7453> wife<WH802>, neither shalt thou covet<WH183> thy neighbour's<WH7453> house<WH1004>, his field<WH7704>, or his manservant<WH5650>, or his maidservant<WH519>, his ox<WH7794>, or his ass<WH2543>, or any thing that is thy neighbour's<WH7453>.

¶ These words<WH1697> the LORD<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto all your assembly<WH6951> in the mount<WH2022> out of the midst<WH8432> of the fire<WH784>, of the cloud<WH6051>, and of the thick darkness<WH6205>, with a great<WH1419> voice<WH6963>: and he added no more<WH3254>. And he wrote<WH3789> them in two<WH8147> tables<WH3871> of stone<WH68>, and delivered<WH5414> them unto me.

And it came to pass, when ye heard<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> out of the midst<WH8432> of the darkness<WH2822>, (for the mountain<WH2022> did burn<WH1197> with fire<WH784>,) that ye came near<WH7126> unto me, even all the heads<WH7218> of your tribes<WH7626>, and your elders<WH2205>;

And ye said<WH559>, Behold, the LORD<WH3068> our God<WH430> hath shewed<WH7200> us his glory<WH3519> and his greatness<WH1433>, and we have heard<WH8085> his voice<WH6963> out of the midst<WH8432> of the fire<WH784>: we have seen<WH7200> this day<WH3117> that God<WH430> doth talk<WH1696> with man<WH120>, and he liveth<WH2425>.

Now therefore why should we die<WH4191>? for this great<WH1419> fire<WH784> will consume<WH398> us: if we hear<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of the LORD<WH3068> our God<WH430> any more<WH3254>, then we shall die<WH4191>.

For who is there of all flesh<WH1320>, that hath heard<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of the living<WH2416> God<WH430> speaking<WH1696> out of the midst<WH8432> of the fire<WH784>, as we have, and lived<WH2421>?

Go thou near<WH7126>, and hear<WH8085> all that the LORD<WH3068> our God<WH430> shall say<WH559>: and speak<WH1696> thou unto us all that the LORD<WH3068> our God<WH430> shall speak<WH1696> unto thee; and we will hear<WH8085> it, and do<WH6213> it.

And the LORD<WH3068> heard<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of your words<WH1697>, when ye spake<WH1696> unto me; and the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto me, I have heard<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of the words<WH1697> of this people<WH5971>, which they have spoken<WH1696> unto thee: they have well<WH3190> said all that they have spoken<WH1696>.

O that there were such<WH2088> an<WH4310> heart<WH3824> in them<WH5414>, that they would fear<WH3372> me, and keep<WH8104> all my commandments<WH4687> always<WH3117>, that it might be well<WH3190> with them, and with their children<WH1121> for ever<WH5769>!
Go<WH3212> say<WH559> to them, Get<WH7725> you into your tents<WH168> again<WH7725>.

But as for thee, stand<WH5975> thou here by me<WH5978>, and I will speak<WH1696> unto thee all the commandments<WH4687>, and the statutes<WH2706>, and the judgments<WH4941>, which thou shalt teach<WH3925> them, that they may do<WH6213> them in the land<WH776> which I give<WH5414> them to possess<WH3423> it.
Ye shall observe<WH8104> to do<WH6213> therefore as the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> hath commanded<WH6680> you: ye shall not turn aside<WH5493> to the right hand<WH3225> or to the left<WH8040>.

Ye shall walk<WH3212> in all the ways<WH1870> which the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> hath commanded<WH6680> you, that ye may live<WH2421>, and that it may be well<WH2895> with you, and that ye may prolong<WH748> your days<WH3117> in the land<WH776> which ye shall possess<WH3423>.
